metadata.title: MOROBOR Ceiling Fan Pull Chains, 12 Inch Blue Ripple Round Ball and Gourd Shape Pendant Pull Chain for Lighting, Fans, Ceiling Fans, Lamps
features: Decorate Your Space: These two design, blue ripple round ball and gourd pull chains are simple and classic. What’s more, they are shining in the sun, adding brilliance to your life.
Durable and Sturdy: The fan pull chains are made of hard iron to make sure the beaded ball chains are durable and not easy to pull apart.
Wide Application: Replacement for broken or outdated ceiling fan cord. It is suit for ceiling light, ceiling fan, guyed desk lamp, bracket light.
Easy Installation: You can easily cut the pull chain into your desired length to install, which is convenient for your daily life.
Package: 1 x round ball fan pull chain, 1 x gourd fan pull chain.
description: Replacement for broken or outdated ceiling fan cord. It is suit for ceiling light, ceiling fan, guyed desk lamp, bracket light. You can easily cut the pull chain into your desired length to install, which is convenient for your daily life.
Size: Length of pull chains: 12’’; Diameter of each bead: 3mm
Package: 1 x round ball fan pull chain, 1 x gourd fan pull chain.
We provide 30-days money-back and 12 months warranty, do not hesitate to contact us when you have any questions.
